name: Magic Twist - Piano Hop Games
description:
Are you looking for a mini game that is fun, easy-to-start yet challenging at the same time? Magic Twist is the ONE

Key features:
*Trending music genres: Dubstep, EDM, Electro, Trap
*Stunning design: different balls to choose from, various backgrounds going with the songs
*Include free options to unlock songs and collect gems
*Trial feature: curious about some locked songs? No worries, we got you covered! You can try beforehand
*User-friendly UI & UX


How to play:
*Tap the screen, control the twister and follow the music
*Try Not to fall off the Tiles
*Collect gems to unlock new hot songs

What is your best score ?

Privacy Policy:http://bit.ly/2CFcFjU
